KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Directory compare 005
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareGT compareNE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compare functions to do a case-sensitive comparison of two objects of the same type. A Boolean value is returned.

Syntax.Note:
The key-value pair of the first Directory is lesser than the key-value pair
of the second Directory.

The key-value pair of the first Directory is lesser than the key-value pair
of the second Directory.
Syntax.Hints: If you prefer a Boolean resulting from the comparison, use the compareEQ, compareNE, compareGT, compareLT functions.
